channel.title: .bat to .sh
channel.description:
Hi, i need help converting @echo off title runserver "C:/Program Files/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx815m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false pause
into a .sh so it can run on linux, if you can can you post it under here? Thanks

item.title: .bat to .sh
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

java <vm_args> -cp <libraries to load, separated by a colon> com.rs.Launcher <program_args>

You don’t need to specify to turn echo off, or set the title, or pause, so that line’s all you need.

Read full topic

item.title: .bat to .sh
item.dc:creator: @soapeater3 soapeater3
item.description:
@soapeater3 wrote:

Hi, i need help converting
@echo off
title runserver
“C:/Program Files/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe” -Xmx815m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false
pause

into a .sh so it can run on linux, if you can can you post it under here? Thanks

Read full topic
